00007         Data::Data() {
00008                 super("maven.Data");
00009                 size = 0;
00010                 allocatedSize = 0;
00011                 position = 0;
00012                 head = NULL;
00013         }
00014         
00015         void Data::allocateBytes(mlong bytes) {
00016                 // see if there is enough space left
00017                 if(bytes + size <= allocatedSize) return;
00018                 
00019                 // we have to allocate some more memory
00020                 DataChunk* newChunk = new DataChunk();
00021                 if(head == NULL)
00022                         head = newChunk;
00023                 tail = head;
00024                 
00025                 allocatedSize += MAVEN_DATA_CHUNKSIZE;
00026         }
00027         
00028         mboolean Data::setPosition(mlong pos) {
00029                 if(pos < 0)
00030                         return setPosition(allocatedSize + pos);
00031                         
00032                 if(pos > allocatedSize) return false;
00033                 position = pos;
00034                 return true;
00035         }
00036         
00037         void Data::write(mbyte* data, mlong bytes) {
00038                 std::memmove(tail->chunk + position, data, bytes);
00039                 position += bytes;
00040         }
00041         
00042         void Data::writeBoolean(mboolean data) {
00043                 allocateBytes(sizeof(mboolean));
00044                 write((char*) &data, sizeof(mboolean));
00045                 size += sizeof(mboolean);
00046         }

00097                 mboolean temp;
00098                 memmove((void*) &temp, tail->chunk + position, sizeof(mboolean));
